snippet: During a visit to Washington by the leaders of Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone, President Obama said the global response must continue.
abstract: Pres Obama calls for rebuilding of decimated health systems in Liberia, Guinea and Sierra Leone and continued global response there following easing of Ebola crisis.
lead_paragraph: During a visit to Washington by the leaders of Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone, President Obama said the global response must continue.

headline.main: As Ebola Retreats, Obama Urges Vigilance and Preparation in West Africa
headline.print_headline: With Ebola in Retreat, Obama Calls for Caution
